00006 #define ALIGN_ADDR( addr, start, mask )         ( start + ( ( ( size_t )addr - ( size_t )start ) & mask ) )
00007 
00008 //----------------------------------------------------------
00009 void
00010 Compress( void* dstData, unsigned int& dstSize, const void* srcData, unsigned int srcSize, void* workspace )
00011 {
00012         // partition the incoming data into the desired type.
00013         compress_type_t* src = ( compress_type_t* )srcData;
00014         compress_type_t* dst = ( compress_type_t* )dstData;
00015 
00016         // calculate the block address mask.
00017         unsigned int blockMask = ~( LZB_WORDS_PER_BLOCK - 1 );
00018 
00019         // initialize the current size specifier.
00020         compress_type_t* size = dst;
00021         *size = 0;
00022         ++dst;
00023 
00024         // look for any matching sequences.
00025         compress_type_t* cur = src;
00026         compress_type_t* end = src + srcSize;
00027         while ( cur < end )
00028         {
00029                 // get values from the block's start to the current location.
00030                 compress_type_t matchLen = 0;
00031                 compress_type_t* block = ALIGN_ADDR( cur, src, blockMask );
00032                 compress_type_t* matchSrc = block;
00033                 compress_type_t* matchEnd = cur;
00034                 compress_type_t* bestMatch = matchSrc;
00035 
00036                 // scan for matches.
00037                 while ( matchSrc < matchEnd )
00038                 {
00039                         compress_type_t curLen = 0;
00040                         compress_type_t* ms = matchSrc;
00041                         compress_type_t* mc = cur;
00042                         while ( *ms++ == *mc++ )
00043                                 ++curLen;
00044 
00045                         if ( curLen > matchLen )
00046                         {
00047                                 matchLen = curLen;
00048                                 bestMatch = matchSrc;
00049                         }
00050 
00051                         ++matchSrc;
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 // check to see if a valid match was found.  If not, simply
00055                 // output bytes.
00056                 if ( matchLen <= 2 )
00057                 {
00058                         // do we need to start a new run?
00059                         if ( *size > 253 )
00060                         {
00061                                 size = dst;
00062                                 *size = 0;
00063                                 ++dst;
00064                         }
00065 
00066                         // simply write two uncompressed bytes.
00067                         *size -= 2;
00068                         *dst++ = *cur++;
00069                         *dst++ = *cur++;
00070                 }
00071                 else
00072                 {
00073                         // write compression info.
00074                         size_t offset = matchSrc - block;
00075                         *size = ( compress_type_t )matchLen;
00076                         *dst++ = ( compress_type_t )offset;
00077                         cur += matchLen;
00078 
00079                         // update the size pointer.
00080                         size = dst;
00081                         *size = 0;
00082                         ++dst;
00083                 }
00084         }
00085 
00086         // return the destination size.
00087         dstSize = ( unsigned int )( ( size_t )dst - ( size_t )dstData );
00088 }

00090 //----------------------------------------------------------
00091 void
00092 Decompress( void* dstData, unsigned int& dstSize, const void* srcData, unsigned int srcSize )
00093 {
00094         // partition the incoming data into the desired type.
00095         compress_type_t* src = ( compress_type_t* )srcData;
00096         compress_type_t* dst = ( compress_type_t* )dstData;
00097 
00098         // calculate the block address mask.
00099         unsigned int blockMask = ~( LZB_WORDS_PER_BLOCK - 1 );
00100 
00101         // decompress the current block.
00102         compress_type_t* cur = dst;
00103         compress_type_t* end = src + srcSize;
00104         while ( src < end )
00105         {
00106                 // get the start and the length.
00107                 compress_type_t length = *src++;
00108 
00109                 // emit values.
00110                 if ( length < 0 )
00111                 {
00112                         // write raw data.
00113                         while ( length++ < 0 )
00114                                 *cur++ = *src++;
00115                 }
00116                 else
00117                 {
00118                         // get the starting location in the block.
00119                         compress_type_t start = *src++;
00120         
00121                         // duplicate values.
00122                         compress_type_t* matchSrc = ALIGN_ADDR( cur, dst, blockMask );
00123                         while ( length-- > 0 )
00124                                 *cur++ = *matchSrc++;
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 
00128         // return the destination size.
00129         dstSize = ( unsigned int )( ( size_t )dst - ( size_t )dstData );
00130 }
